arts.ttl: Milan monitor Zion Suzuki as Maignan’s potential successor
arts.sum: Tomorrow night, Milan's only goal away at Parma will be to take home all three points. The club's directors will be present in the stands, including sporting director Igli Tare, who will be watching one Parma player closely: 23-year-old goalkeeper Zion Suzuki, a name highly appreciated at Casa Milan. Could Zion Suzuki be Maignan's replacement […]

arts.ttl: Serie A Betting Preview: Parma vs Milan
arts.sum: Fresh off a 1-0 home win over Roma, early-season Scudetto contenders Milan travel to Stadio Ennio Tardini to take on Parma. Unlike their visitors, the Crusaders seem set for another season-long fight against the drop. The post Serie A Betting Preview: Parma vs Milan appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.
